title: Crime Alert 08.17.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.17.18
description:
New report details sex abuse of over 1000 children by priests and the following coverup. Accomplice pleads guilty in the death of a 13 year old girl lured into a sex relationship with an college athlete. Remains of teen missing for nearly 40 years discovered.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
